description: Moves north to cold street outside
result:
<< Outside >>
You are outside in the cold. To the east is a dead end. To the west is the rest of the street. Papers are blowing around. It's amazingly cold for this time of year.

description: Moves west onto the city streets
result:
<< Outside >>
You are still on the streets. To the north is a restraunt where the mayor ate often. To the east is the Mayor's home.

[Your score has just gone up by ten points.]

description: Is killed entering restaurant from the north
result:
<< Restraunt >>
You are about to enter the restraunt when two guys jump you. They take your wallet and beat you a bit. Then you flash your badge and that riles them. Your body was discovered in a river 10 miles away.


    *** You have died ***


In that game you scored 30 out of a possible 360, in 7 turns.

Would you like to RESTART, RESTORE a saved game, give the FULL score for that game or QUIT?

description: Reads computer-written note revealing vigilante threat
result:
The note was written on a computer obviously this murder was planned and it says:
We have acclaimed Justice! The Justice of the future! Our next hit is the governer! You CAN'T STOP US! The note sounds like the killers are a group and that they are vigilantes (look it up). You are now getting a bit worried.
